Metadata.title: ...And Justice for All
Metadata.summary: A lawyer is forced to defend a guilty judge, while defending other innocent clients, and trying to find punishment for the guilty and provide justice for the innocent.

Metadata.title: .m4v
Metadata.summary: A veteran policeman, Murtaugh, is partnered with a younger, suicidal officer, Riggs. They both have one thing in common: hating working in pairs. Now they must learn to work with one another to stop a gang of drug smugglers.
Metadata.tagline: If these two can learn to stand each other... the bad guys don't stand a chance.

Metadata.title: 21 Grams
Metadata.summary: A freak accident brings together a critically ill mathematician, a grieving mother, and a born-again ex-con.
Metadata.tagline: How much does life weigh?

Metadata.summary: Roger Maris and Mickey Mantle race to break Babe Ruth's single-season home run record.

Metadata.title: After Hours
Metadata.summary: An ordinary word processor has the worst night of his life after he agrees to visit a girl in Soho whom he met that evening at a coffee shop.
Metadata.tagline: When it's after midnight in New York City, you don't have to look for love, laughter and trouble. They'll all find you!

Metadata.title: Alive
Metadata.summary: A Uruguayan rugby team stranded in the snow swept Andes are forced to use desperate measures to survive after a plane crash.
Metadata.tagline: They survived the impossible...by doing the unthinkable.

Metadata.title: American Beauty
Metadata.summary: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.
Metadata.tagline: Look closer.

Metadata.title: American History X
Metadata.summary: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.
Metadata.tagline: Some Legacies Must End.

Metadata.title: Amores perros
Metadata.summary: A horrific car accident connects three stories, each involving characters dealing with loss, regret, and life's harsh realities, all in the name of love.
Metadata.tagline: Love. Betrayal. Death.

Metadata.title: Any Given Sunday
Metadata.summary: A behind-the-scenes look at the life-and-death struggles of modern-day gladiators and those who lead them.
Metadata.tagline: Play or be Played.

Metadata.title: Apocalypse Now
Metadata.summary: During the Vietnam War, Captain Willard is sent on a dangerous mission into Cambodia to assassinate a renegade colonel who has set himself up as a god among a local tribe.
Metadata.tagline: This is the end...

Metadata.title: Audition
Metadata.summary: A widower takes an offer to screen girls at a special audition, arranged for him by a friend to find him a new wife. The one he fancies is not who she appears to be after all.
Metadata.tagline: She always gets a part

Metadata.title: Babel
Metadata.summary: Tragedy strikes a married couple on vacation in the Moroccan desert, touching off an interlocking story involving four different families.
Metadata.tagline: If You Want to be Understood...Listen

Metadata.title: Baby Doll
Metadata.summary: A steamy tale of two Southern rivals and a sensuous nineteen-year-old virgin.
Metadata.tagline: She's nineteen. She makes her husband keep away -- she won't let the stranger go.

Metadata.title: Badlands
Metadata.summary: An impressionable teenage girl from a dead-end town and her older greaser boyfriend embark on a killing spree in the South Dakota badlands.
Metadata.tagline: In 1959 a lot of people were killing time. Kit and Holly were killing people.

Metadata.title: The Banquet
Metadata.summary: A loose adaptation of Hamlet, "The Night Banquet" is set in an empire in chaos. The Emperor, the Empress, the Crown Prince, the Minister and the General all have their own enemies they would like to finish off at a night banquet.
Metadata.tagline: Nothing is more poisonous than the human heart.

Metadata.title: Bastille Day
Metadata.summary: A young artist and former CIA agent embark on an anti-terrorist mission in France.
Metadata.tagline: With law comes disorder

Metadata.title: Battle of the Warriors
Metadata.summary: Story centers on a battle during China's Warring States Period, a series of civil wars, which spanned from the 5th to the 3rd century B.C. Based on a popular Japanese manga, which was in turn based a Japanese novel inspired by Warring States history in China.

Metadata.title: Being John Malkovich
Metadata.summary: A puppeteer discovers a portal that leads literally into the head of movie star John Malkovich.
Metadata.tagline: Ever wanted to be someone else? Now you can.

Metadata.title: The Best Little Whorehouse in Texas
Metadata.summary: Town Sheriff and regular patron, fights to keep a historical whorehouse open when a TV preacher targets it as the Devils playhouse.
Metadata.tagline: With Burt and Dolly this much fun just couldn't be legal!

Part.file: /mnt/nas/video/Movies/mommy/ADULTS ONLY/The Best Little Whorehouse In Texas [1982].mp4

Metadata.title: The Best Man
Metadata.summary: Harper, a writer who's about to explode into the mainstream leaves behind his girlfriend Robin and heads to New York City to serve as best man for his friend Lance's wedding. Once there, he reunites with the rest of his college circle.

Metadata.title: Boiler Room
Metadata.summary: A college dropout, attempting to win back his father's high standards he gets a job as a broker for a suburban investment firm, which puts him on the fast track to success, but the job might not be as legitimate as it once appeared to be.
Metadata.tagline: Welcome to the new American dream.

Metadata.title: Bridget Jones's Diary
Metadata.summary: Academy Award winner Renée Zellweger (Best Supporting Actress, Cold Mountain, Chicago) and Hugh
Metadata.tagline: Health Warning: Adopting Bridget's lifestyle could seriously damage your health.

Metadata.title: A Bronx Tale
Metadata.summary: A father becomes worried when a local gangster befriends his son in the Bronx in the 1960s.
Metadata.tagline: One man lives in the neighborhood, another man owns it.

Metadata.title: Brother
Metadata.summary: An ex-soldier with a personal honor code enters the family crime business in St. Petersburg, Russia.

Metadata.title: Brother 2
Metadata.summary: Here goes "kirdyk" to America, as it was promised in first part.
Metadata.tagline: Danila returns!

Metadata.title: Can You Ever Forgive Me?
Metadata.summary: When Lee Israel falls out of step with current tastes, she turns her art form to deception.

Metadata.title: Carlito's Way
Metadata.summary: A Puerto Rican former convict, just released from prison, pledges to stay away from drugs and violence despite the pressure around him and lead on to a better life outside of N.Y.C.
Metadata.tagline: He's got a good future if he can live past next week.

Metadata.title: Casino
Metadata.summary: Greed, deception, money, power, and murder occur between two best friends: a mafia underboss and a casino owner, for a trophy wife over a gambling empire.
Metadata.tagline: No one stays at the top forever.

Metadata.title: Changeling
Metadata.summary: A grief-stricken mother takes on the LAPD to her own detriment when it tries to pass off an obvious impostor as her missing child.
Metadata.tagline: To find her son, she did what no one else dared.

Metadata.title: Charlie Wilson's War
Metadata.summary: A drama based on a Texas congressman Charlie Wilson's covert dealings in Afghanistan, where his efforts to assist rebels in their war with the Soviets have some unforeseen and long-reaching effects.
Metadata.tagline: Based on a true story. You think we could make all this up?

Metadata.title: Chicago
Metadata.summary: Murderesses Velma Kelly and Roxie Hart find themselves on death row together and fight for the fame that will keep them from the gallows in 1920s Chicago.
Metadata.tagline: If You Can't Be Famous, Be Infamous

Metadata.title: Chocolat
Metadata.summary: A woman and her daughter open a chocolate shop in a small French village that shakes up the rigid morality of the community.
Metadata.tagline: ...and the world is still indulging!

Metadata.title: Cinema Paradiso
Metadata.summary: A filmmaker recalls his childhood, when he fell in love with the movies at his village's theater and formed a deep friendship with the theater's projectionist.
Metadata.tagline: A celebration of youth, friendship, and the everlasting magic of the movies.

Metadata.title: City By The Sea
Metadata.summary: Vincent Lamarca, whose father was executed for a 1950s kidnapping of a child, grew up to become a police officer, only to see his own son become a murderer.
Metadata.tagline: When you're searching for a killer... the last suspect you want to see is your son.

Metadata.title: City Hall
Metadata.summary: The accidental shooting of a boy in New York leads to an investigation by the Deputy Mayor, and unexpectedly far-reaching consequences.
Metadata.tagline: It started with a shootout on a rainswept street and ended in a scandal that shattered New York.

Metadata.title: The Crossing Guard
Metadata.summary: Freddie Gale is a seedy jeweler who has sworn to kill the drunk driver who killed his little girl.
Metadata.tagline: ...some lives cross, others collide.

Metadata.title: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon
Metadata.summary: A young Chinese warrior steals a sword from a famed swordsman and then escapes into a world of romantic adventure with a mysterious man in the frontier of the nation.
Metadata.tagline: A timeless story of strength, secrets and two warriors who would never surrender.

Metadata.title: Dallas Buyers Club
Metadata.summary: In 1985 Dallas, electrician and hustler Ron Woodroof works around the system to help AIDS patients get the medication they need after he is diagnosed with the disease.
Metadata.tagline: Sometimes it takes a hustler to change the world

Metadata.title: The Darjeeling Limited
Metadata.summary: A year after their father's funeral, three brothers travel across India by train in an attempt to bond with each other.

Metadata.title: Dazed and Confused
Metadata.summary: The adventures of high school and junior high students on the last day of school in May 1976.
Metadata.tagline: See it with a bud.

Metadata.title: Dead Presidents
Metadata.summary: A Vietnam vet adjusts to life after the war while trying to support his family, but the chance of a better life may involve crime and bloodshed.
Metadata.tagline: In this daring heist, the only color that counts is green

Metadata.title: The Death of Stalin
Metadata.summary: Proclaimed “the funniest political comedy of the year” (The Daily Beast), The Death of Stalin delivers a brutally executed parody of Cold War Russia. When the tyrannical ruler Stalin dies, his hapless inner circle scrambles to come up with the next evolut
Metadata.tagline: In the Kremlin, no one can hear you scheme

Metadata.title: Deepwater
Metadata.summary: A drifter comes to the town of Deepwater and is seduced into a twisted game of deceit and murder.

Metadata.title: Desolation Angels
Metadata.summary: Returning home from a trip to visit his mother, Nick discovers that a good friend of his, Sid, has apparently raped his girlfriend, Mary. More concerned with his own wounded pride than with Mary's lingering feelings of guilt, pain and betrayal, Nick vows revenge.

Metadata.title: The Devil's Backbone
Metadata.summary: After Carlos - a 12-year-old whose father has died in the Spanish Civil War - arrives at an ominous boys' orphanage, he discovers the school is haunted and has many dark secrets that he must uncover.
Metadata.tagline: The living will always be more dangerous than the dead.

Metadata.title: The Devil's Own
Metadata.summary: A police officer uncovers the real identity of his house-guest, an I.R.A. terrorist in hiding.
Metadata.tagline: They come from different worlds. They fight for different causes. Now, two men from opposite sides of the law are about to go to war.

Metadata.title: Dog Day Afternoon
Metadata.summary: A man robs a bank to pay for his lover's operation; it turns into a hostage situation and a media circus.
Metadata.tagline: The most bizarre bank siege ever

Metadata.title: Dogma
Metadata.summary: An abortion clinic worker with a special heritage is called upon to save the existence of humanity from being negated by two renegade angels trying to exploit a loop-hole and reenter Heaven.
Metadata.tagline: It can be Hell getting into Heaven

Metadata.title: Dolores Claiborne
Metadata.summary: A big-city reporter travels to the small town where her mother has been arrested for the murder of an elderly woman that she works for as a maid.
Metadata.tagline: Sometimes, an accident can be an unhappy woman's best friend.

Metadata.title: Donnie Brasco
Metadata.summary: An FBI undercover agent infiltrates the mob and finds himself identifying more with the mafia life, at the expense of his regular one.
Metadata.tagline: Based on a true story.

Metadata.title: Donnie Darko
Metadata.summary: A troubled teenager is plagued by visions of a man in a large rabbit suit who manipulates him to commit a series of crimes, after he narrowly escapes a bizarre accident.
Metadata.tagline: You can never go too far

Metadata.title: Down in the Delta
Metadata.summary: Rosa Lynn sends her druggie daughter Loretta and her children Thomas and Tracy away from the big city to live with their uncle Earl in the ancestral home in rural Mississippi. Earl puts Loretta to work in his restaurant, Just Chicken, while also telling them about the generations of their family, the Sinclairs, dating back to their time in slavery before the the Civil War.
Metadata.tagline: Sometimes, the last place you expected to be is the one place you've always belonged...

Metadata.title: Ed Wood
Metadata.summary: An ambitious but troubled movie director tries his best to fulfill his dream, despite his lack of support.
Metadata.tagline: When it came to making bad movies, Ed Wood was the best.

Metadata.title: The Eiger Sanction
Metadata.summary: A classical art professor and collector, who doubles as a professional assassin, is coerced out of retirement to avenge the murder of an old friend.
Metadata.tagline: EASTWOOD is the man . . Eiger is the location . . and the sanction - is a licence to kill!

Metadata.title: An Empress and the Warriors
Metadata.summary: After the death of her father, a woman is forced to take over as empress and fight to save her kingdom.

Metadata.title: Enemy of the State
Metadata.summary: A lawyer becomes a target by a corrupt politician and his NSA goons when he accidentally receives key evidence to a serious politically motivated crime.
Metadata.tagline: It's not paranoia if they're really after you.

Metadata.title: Entrapment
Metadata.summary: An insurance agent is sent by her employer to track down and help capture an art thief.
Metadata.tagline: The trap is set.

Metadata.title: Europa Europa
Metadata.summary: A boy in Nazi Germany, trying to conceal that he is Jewish, joins the Hitler Youth.

Metadata.title: Eve's Bayou
Metadata.summary: The story is set in 1962 Louisiana. The big Batiste family is headed by charming doctor Louis. Though he is married to beautiful Roz, he has a weakness for attractive women patients. One day Louis is flirting with married and sexy Metty Mereaux, not knowing that he is observed by his youngest idealistic daughter Eve, who is there by accident. Eve can not forget the incident which is traumatic for her naivete and shares a secret with older sister Cisely. Lies start to roll...
Metadata.tagline: The secrets that hold us together can also tear us apart.

Metadata.title: Falling Down
Metadata.summary: An unemployed defense worker frustrated with the various flaws he sees in society, begins to psychotically and violently lash out against them.
Metadata.tagline: A Tale Of Urban Reality

Metadata.title: Fargo
Metadata.summary: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.
Metadata.tagline: A lot can happen in the middle of nowhere.

Metadata.title: The Favourite
Metadata.summary: In early 18th-century England, a frail Queen Anne (Olivia Colman) occupies the throne and her

Metadata.title: Fighting Elegy
Metadata.summary: In Okayama in the mid-1930s, Kiroku attends high school and boards with a Catholic family whose daughter, Michiko, captures his heart. He must, however, hide his ardor and other aspects of his emerging sexuality, focusing his energy on a gang he joins, breaking school rules, and getting into scuffles (he tells her, "Oh, Michiko, I don't masturbate, I fight"). He comes under the influence of a young tough nicknamed Terrapin, and together they lead fights against rival gangs. Gradually, Kiroku and Terrapin align themselves with the right-wing Kita Ikki, and Kiroku becomes a stand-in for the attitudes of Japanese youth who embraced the imperialism leading to World War II.

Metadata.title: Firefox
Metadata.summary: A pilot is sent into the Soviet Union on a mission to steal a prototype jet fighter that can be partially controlled by a neuralink
Metadata.tagline: ...the most devastating killing machine ever built... his job... steal it!

Metadata.title: The Fisher King
Metadata.summary: A former radio DJ, suicidally despondent because of a terrible mistake he made, finds redemption in helping a deranged homeless man who was an unwitting victim of that mistake.
Metadata.tagline: A Modern Day Tale About The Search For Love, Sanity, Ethel Merman And The Holy Grail.

Metadata.title: Five Easy Pieces
Metadata.summary: A dropout from upper-class America picks up work along the way on oil rigs when his life isn't spent in a squalid succession of bars, motels, and other points of interest.
Metadata.tagline: He rode the fast lane on the road to nowhere.

Metadata.title: Following
Metadata.summary: A young writer who follows strangers for material meets a thief who takes him under his wing.

Metadata.title: Formosa Betrayed
Metadata.summary: An FBI agent while unveiling a series of international conspiracy is embroiled in a set of political intrigue.

Metadata.title: Fortress of War
Metadata.summary: A war drama set during the Nazi invasion of the Soviet Union in June 1941, in which Soviet troops held on to a border stronghold for nine days.
Metadata.tagline: Die but don't surrender

Metadata.title: Free State of Jones
Metadata.summary: A disillusioned Confederate army deserter returns to Mississippi and leads a militia of fellow deserters, runaway slaves, and women in an uprising against the corrupt local Confederate government.
Metadata.tagline: Based on the incredible true story.

Metadata.title: The French Connection
Metadata.summary: A pair of NYC cops in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a drug smuggling job with a French connection.
Metadata.tagline: There are no rules and no holds barred when Popeye cuts loose!

Metadata.title: French Connection II
Metadata.summary: "Popeye" Doyle travels to Marseille to find Alain Charnier, the drug smuggler who eluded him in New York.

Metadata.title: Glengarry Glen Ross
Metadata.summary: An examination of the machinations behind the scenes at a real estate office.
Metadata.tagline: Lie. Cheat. Steal. All in a day’s work.

Metadata.title: The Godfather
Metadata.summary: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
Metadata.tagline: An offer you can't refuse.

Metadata.title: The Godfather: Part II
Metadata.summary: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York is portrayed while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.
Metadata.tagline: I don't feel I have to wipe everybody out, Tom. Just my enemies.

Metadata.title: The Godfather: Part III
Metadata.summary: In the midst of trying to legitimize his business dealings in New York and Italy in 1979, aging Mafia don Michael Corleone seeks to avow for his sins while taking his nephew Vincent Mancini under his wing.
Metadata.tagline: All the power on earth can't change destiny.

Metadata.title: The Good Girl
Metadata.summary: A discount store clerk strikes up an affair with a stock boy who considers himself the incarnation of Holden Caulfield.
Metadata.tagline: It's her last best chance... is she going to take it?

Metadata.title: GoodFellas
Metadata.summary: The story of Henry Hill and his life through the teen years into the years of mafia, covering his relationship with wife Karen Hill and his Mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVitto in the Italian-American crime syndicate.
Metadata.tagline: Three Decades of Life in the Mafia.

Metadata.title: The Green Mile
Metadata.summary: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.
Metadata.tagline: Miracles do happen.

Metadata.title: Grosse Pointe Blank
Metadata.summary: Martin Blank is a professional assassin. He is sent on a mission to a small Detroit suburb, Grosse Pointe, and, by coincidence, his ten-year high school reunion party is taking place there at the same time.
Metadata.tagline: Even a hit man deserves a second shot.

Metadata.title: Hamburger Hill
Metadata.summary: A very realistic interpretation of one of the bloodiest battles of the Vietnam War.
Metadata.tagline: War at its worst. Men at their best.

Metadata.title: Hard-Hearted
Metadata.summary: A provincial war vet arrives in Moscow and subsequently takes on a gang of bad cops.

Metadata.title: The Harder They Come
Metadata.summary: Wishing to become a successful Reggae singer, a young Jamaican man finds himself tied to corrupt record producers and drug pushers.
Metadata.tagline: With a Piece in His Hand He Takes on the Man!

Metadata.title: Heartbreak Ridge
Metadata.summary: A hard-nosed, hard-living Marine gunnery sergeant clashes with his superiors and his ex-wife as he takes command of a spoiled recon platoon with a bad attitude.
Metadata.tagline: ...the scars run deep.

Metadata.title: Heat
Metadata.summary: A group of professional bank robbers start to feel the heat from police when they unknowingly leave a clue at their latest heist, while both sides attempts to find balance their personal lives with their professional lives.
Metadata.tagline: A Los Angeles Crime Saga

Metadata.title: High Fidelity
Metadata.summary: Rob, a record store owner and compulsive list maker, recounts his top five breakups, including the one in progress.
Metadata.tagline: A comedy about fear of commitment, hating your job, falling in love and other pop favorites.

Metadata.title: The Horde
Metadata.summary: It is the word "horde" that had meant, for many countries and nations, bloody raids and being under humilating contribution for centuries - a strange and scary world with its own rules and customs. To be or not to be for Rus (Ruthenia), that is the price of the one-man mission as he is departing to this world to accomplish a feat. The film tells the story of how Saint Alexius, the Metropolitan of Moscow and Wonderworker of All Russia, healed the Tatar Queen Taidula, Jani-Beg's mother, from blindness, in 1357

Metadata.title: The Hurricane
Metadata.summary: The story of Rubin "Hurricane" Carter, a boxer wrongly imprisoned for murder, and the people who aided in his fight to prove his innocence.
Metadata.tagline: His greatest fight was for justice.

Metadata.title: The Hurt Locker
Metadata.summary: During the Iraq War, a Sergeant recently assigned to an army bomb squad is put at odds with his squad mates due to his maverick way of handling his work.
Metadata.tagline: You'll know when you're in it.

Metadata.title: In the Line of Fire
Metadata.summary: Secret Service agent Frank Horrigan couldn't save Kennedy, but he's determined not to let a clever assassin take out this president.
Metadata.tagline: An assassin on the loose. A president in danger. Only one man stands between them...

Metadata.title: In the Mood for Love
Metadata.summary: Two neighbors, a woman and a man, form a strong bond after both suspect extramarital activities of their spouses. However, they agree to keep their bond platonic so as not to commit similar wrongs.

Metadata.title: Indiana Jones And The Raiders Of The Lost Ark
Metadata.summary: Archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis.
Metadata.tagline: Indiana Jones - the new hero from the creators of JAWS and STAR WARS.

Part.file: /mnt/nas/video/Movies/mommy/ADULTS ONLY/Indiana Jones And The Raiders Of The Lost Ark.mp4

Metadata.title: Insomnia
Metadata.summary: In a Norwegian city with a 24-hour daylight cycle a Swedish murder investigator has been brought in on a special case. Sleep deprived, he makes a horrible mistake which is discovered by the killer he has been hunting.
Metadata.tagline: No peace for the wicked

Metadata.title: Irreversible
Metadata.summary: Events over the course of one traumatic night in Paris unfold in reverse-chronological order as the beautiful Alex is brutally raped and beaten by a stranger in the underpass.
Metadata.tagline: Time destroys everything.

Metadata.title: Jackie Brown
Metadata.summary: A middle-aged woman finds herself in the middle of a huge conflict that will either make her a profit or cost her life.
Metadata.tagline: Six players on the trail of a half a million in Cash. There's only one question... Who's playing who?

Metadata.title: Jacob's Ladder
Metadata.summary: Mourning his dead child, a haunted Vietnam War veteran attempts to discover his past while suffering from a severe case of dissociation. To do so, he must decipher reality and life from his own dreams, delusion, and perception of death.
Metadata.tagline: The most frightening thing about Jacob Singer's nightmare is that he isn't dreaming.

Metadata.title: Just Cause
Metadata.summary: A Harvard professor is lured back into the courtroom after 25 years to take the case of a young black man condemned to death for the horrific murder of a child.
Metadata.tagline: Buried deep in the Florida Everglades is a secret that can save an innocent man or let a killer kill again.

Metadata.title: The Kids Are All Right
Metadata.summary: Two children conceived by artificial insemination bring their biological father into their non-traditional family life.
Metadata.tagline: Nic and Jules had the perfect family, until they met the man who made it all possible.

Metadata.title: The King
Metadata.summary: A troubled man, recently discharged from the Navy, goes to Corpus Christi, Texas, in search of the father he's never met.
Metadata.tagline: The devil made me do it.

Metadata.title: Knocked Up
Metadata.summary: For fun-loving party animal Ben Stone, the last thing he ever expected was for his one-night stand to show up on his doorstep eight weeks later to tell him she's pregnant with his child.
Metadata.tagline: Save the due date.

Metadata.title: Lantana
Metadata.summary: The relationships of four couples unravel after the discovery of a young woman's body in Lantana bush in suburban Sydney.
Metadata.tagline: Sometimes love isn't enough.

Metadata.title: Last Orders
Metadata.summary: A group of old friends reminisce about their lives over the years after the death of one of their crew.

Metadata.title: Last Passenger
Metadata.summary: A small group of everyday passengers on a speeding London commuter train battle their warped driver who has a dark plan for everyone on-board.
Metadata.tagline: A small group of everyday passengers on a speeding London commuter train battle their warped driver who has a dark plan for everyone on board.

Metadata.title: The Last Time
Metadata.summary: A salesman (Keaton) rediscovers a lust for life after falling for the fiancée of his new business partner (Fraser), a Midwest transplant finding his footing in New York City.

Part.file: /mnt/nas/video/Movies/mommy/ADULTS ONLY/Downloads/The Last Time [2006] - (Starring Michael Keaton, Daniel Stern, Brendan Fraser).mp4

Metadata.title: Legend No. 17
Metadata.summary: Biopic of Russian ice hockey legend Valeri Kharlamov from early childhood, rising to the pinnacle of the sport and his untimely death.

Metadata.title: The Legend of 1900
Metadata.summary: A baby boy, discovered in 1900 on an ocean liner, grows into a musical prodigy, never setting foot on land.
Metadata.tagline: A beatiful story of a man who could do anything... except be ordinary.

Metadata.title: Legends of the Fall
Metadata.summary: In the 1900s, three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana are affected by betrayal, history, love, nature, and war.
Metadata.tagline: After the Fall from Innocence the Legend begins.

Metadata.title: The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou
Metadata.summary: With a plan to exact revenge on a mythical shark that killed his partner, oceanographer Steve Zissou rallies a crew that includes his estranged wife, a journalist, and a man who may or may not be his son.
Metadata.tagline: The deeper you go, the weirder life gets.

Part.file: /mnt/nas/video/Movies/mommy/ADULTS ONLY/The Life Aquatic With Steve Zissou [2004].mp4

Metadata.title: Life of Brian
Metadata.summary: Brian is born on the original Christmas, in the stable next door. He spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.
Metadata.tagline: He wasn't the messiah. He was a very naughty boy.

Metadata.title: Limbo
Metadata.summary: In an economically devastated Alaskan town, a fisherman with a troublesome past dates a woman whose young daughter does not approve of him. When he witnesses the murder of his shady brother, he, the woman and the kid run to the wilderness.
Metadata.tagline: The Only Thing More Dangerous Than Death... Is Survival.

Metadata.title: The Limey
Metadata.summary: An extremely volatile and dangerous Englishman goes to Los Angeles to find the man he considers responsible for his daughter's death.
Metadata.tagline: Vengeance knows no boundaries.

Metadata.title: The Lincoln Lawyer
Metadata.summary: A defense attorney has a crisis of conscience when he represents a wealthy client who has a foolproof plan to beat the system.
Metadata.tagline: This Case is a Dangerous Game of Life and Death

Metadata.title: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels
Metadata.summary: A botched card game in London triggers four friends, thugs, weed-growers, hard gangsters, loan sharks and debt collectors to collide with each other in a series of unexpected events, all for the sake of weed, cash and two antique shotguns.
Metadata.tagline: A Disgrace to Criminals Everywhere.

Part.file: /mnt/nas/video/Movies/mommy/ADULTS ONLY/Lock, stock, and two smoking barrels.mp4

Metadata.title: The Man Who Wasn't There
Metadata.summary: A laconic, chain-smoking barber blackmails his wife's boss and lover for money to invest in dry cleaning, but his plan goes terribly wrong.

Metadata.title: The Master and Margarita
Metadata.summary: The Master and Margarita is a Russian TV mini-series, based on the novel written by Soviet writer Mikhail Bulgakov between 1928 and 1940.
Metadata.tagline: Manuscripts don't burn!

Metadata.title: Mean Streets
Metadata.summary: A small-time hood aspires to work his way up the ranks of a local mob.
Metadata.tagline: You don't make up for your sins in church. You do it in the streets...

Metadata.title: Mississippi Burning
Metadata.summary: Two FBI agents with wildly different styles arrive in Mississippi to investigate the disappearance of some civil rights activists.
Metadata.tagline: 1964. When America was at War with Itself.

Metadata.title: Monster's Ball
Metadata.summary: After a family tragedy, a racist prison guard reexamines his attitudes while falling in love with the African American wife of the last prisoner he executed.
Metadata.tagline: A lifetime of change can happen in a single moment.

Metadata.title: Moulin Rouge!
Metadata.summary: OSCAR® Winner Nicole Kidman, Ewan McGregor, Jim Broadbent and John Lequizamo head an internationally renowned cast in this musical extravaganza. Baz Luhrmann’s sensual reinvention of the movie musical was nominated for 8 ACADEMY AWARDS® including Best Pic
Metadata.tagline: No Laws. No Limits. One Rule. Never Fall In Love.

Metadata.title: National Lampoon's Vacation
Metadata.summary: The Griswold family's cross-country drive to the Walley World theme park proves to be much more arduous than they ever anticipated.
Metadata.tagline: Every summer Chevy Chase takes his family on a little trip. This year he went too far.

Metadata.title: No Man's Land
Metadata.summary: Bosnia and Herzegovina during 1993 at the time of the heaviest fighting between the two warring sides. Two soldiers from opposing sides in the conflict, Nino and Ciki, become trapped in no man's land, whilst a third soldier becomes a living booby trap.

Metadata.title: Of Freaks and Men
Metadata.summary: Dariya the maid getting a boy to touch her large breast is just one incident that occurs when Yohan and Victor infiltrate two families, forcing young Liza and blind Ekaterina to appear in porn, but they are not so innocent themselves.

Metadata.title: Once Upon a Time in America
Metadata.summary: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.
Metadata.tagline: Crime, passion and lust for power - Sergio Leone's explosive saga of gangland America.

Metadata.title: One Day in the Life of Ivan Denisovich
Metadata.summary: Fly-on-the-wall treatment of an ordinary day in the life of a prisoner in Stalin's Gulag. Closely adapted from Solzhenitsyn's classic novel based on his own experiences. Shot entirely on location in northern Norway

Part.file: /mnt/nas/video/Movies/mommy/ADULTS ONLY/Downloads/One Day In The Life Of Ivan Denisovich [1970].mp4

Metadata.title: A Perfect World
Metadata.summary: A kidnapped boy strikes up a friendship with his captor: an escaped convict on the run from the law, headed by an honorable U.S. Marshal.

Metadata.title: Pi
Metadata.summary: A paranoid mathematician searches for a key number that will unlock the universal patterns found in nature.
Metadata.tagline: There will be no order, only chaos

Metadata.title: The Pianist
Metadata.summary: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.
Metadata.tagline: Music was his passion. Survival was his masterpiece.

Metadata.studio: New South Wales Film & Television Office
Metadata.title: The Piano
Metadata.summary: A mute woman is sent to 1850s New Zealand along with her young daughter and prized piano for an arranged marriage to a wealthy landowner, but is soon lusted after by a local worker on the plantation.

Metadata.title: Pink Floyd: The Wall
Metadata.summary: A confined but troubled rock star descends into madness in the midst of his physical and social isolation from everyone.
Metadata.tagline: The Memories. The Madness. The Music... The Movie.

Metadata.title: Pretty Woman
Metadata.summary: A man in a legal but hurtful business needs an escort for some social events, and hires a beautiful prostitute he meets... only to fall in love.
Metadata.tagline: Who knew it was so much fun to be a hooker?

Metadata.title: The Prince of Tides
Metadata.summary: A troubled man talks to his suicidal sister's psychiatrist about their family history and falls in love with her in the process.
Metadata.tagline: A story about the memories that haunt us, and the truth that sets us free.

Metadata.title: A Private War
Metadata.summary: One of the most celebrated war correspondents of our time, Marie Colvin is an utterly fearless and rebellious spirit, driven to the frontline of conflicts across the globe to give voice to the voiceless.
Metadata.tagline: The Most Powerful Weapon Is The Truth

Metadata.title: Punch-Drunk Love
Metadata.summary: A psychologically troubled novelty supplier is nudged towards a romance with an English woman, all the while being extorted by a phone-sex line run by a crooked mattress salesman, and purchasing stunning amounts of pudding.

Metadata.title: Raging Bull
Metadata.summary: An emotionally self-destructive boxer's journey through life, as the violence and temper that leads him to the top in the ring, destroys his life outside it.
Metadata.tagline: An emotionally self-destructive boxer's journey through life, as the violence and temper that leads him to the top in the ring, destroys his life outside it.

Metadata.title: Rain Man
Metadata.summary: Selfish yuppie Charlie Babbitt's father left a fortune to his savant brother Raymond and a pittance to Charlie; they travel cross-country.
Metadata.tagline: A journey through understanding and fellowship.

Metadata.title: Random Hearts
Metadata.summary: A police sergeant and a congresswoman both lose their spouses in a plane crash, and they soon discover that their spouses were having an affair with each other.
Metadata.tagline: In a perfect world...they never would have met.

Metadata.title: Red Cliff
Metadata.summary: The first chapter of a two-part story centered on a battle fought in China's Three Kingdoms period (220-280 A.D.).
Metadata.tagline: The future will be decided.

Metadata.title: Requiem for a Dream
Metadata.summary: The drug-induced utopias of four Coney Island people are shattered when their addictions run deep.

Metadata.title: Road to Perdition
Metadata.summary: Bonds of loyalty are put to the test when a hitman's son witnesses what his father does for a living.
Metadata.tagline: Pray for Michael Sullivan.

Metadata.title: Rob Roy
Metadata.summary: In 1713 Scotland, Rob Roy MacGregor is wronged by a nobleman and his nephew, becomes an outlaw in search of revenge while fleeing the Redcoats, and faces charges of being a Jacobite.
Metadata.tagline: Honor made him a man. Courage made him a hero. History made him a legend.

Metadata.title: Rosewood
Metadata.summary: From the Oscar-nominated writer-director of "Boyz 'N the Hood" comes this moving drama, based on a true story, about heroism and justice. In 1923, a prosperous black town in Florida was burned to the ground, its people hunted and murdered, all because a w
Metadata.tagline: In 1923, a black town in Florida was burned to the ground, its people murdered because of a lie. Some escaped and survived because of the courage and compassion of a few extraordinary people. This film is for them.

Metadata.title: The Royal Tenenbaums
Metadata.summary: An estranged family of former child prodigies reunites when their father announces he is terminally ill.
Metadata.tagline: Family isn’t a word, it’s a sentence.

Metadata.title: Rush Hour
Metadata.summary: Two cops team up to get back a kidnapped daughter.
Metadata.tagline: The Fastest Hands in the East Meet the Biggest Mouth in the West.

Metadata.title: Rushmore
Metadata.summary: The extracurricular king of Rushmore preparatory school is put on academic probation.
Metadata.tagline: Love. Expulsion. Revolution.

Metadata.title: Saturday Night Fever
Metadata.summary: A Brooklyn teenager feels his only chance to succeed is as the king of the disco floor. His carefree youth and weekend dancing help him to forget the reality of his bleak life.
Metadata.tagline: Catch it

Metadata.title: Saving Private Ryan
Metadata.summary: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.
Metadata.tagline: The mission is a man.

Metadata.title: Scarface
Metadata.summary: In Miami in 1980, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.
Metadata.tagline: The world is yours...

Metadata.title: Seven Swords
Metadata.summary: Seven warriors come together to protect a village from a diabolical General.

Metadata.title: Sexy Beast
Metadata.summary: Brutal gangster Don Logan recruits "retired" safecracker Gal for one last job, but it goes badly for both of them.
Metadata.tagline: There's a bit of the beast in all of us.

Metadata.title: Shall We Go to My Place or Your Place or Each Go Home Alone?
Metadata.originalTitle: Ska vi hem till dig ... eller hem till mig ... eller var och en till sitt?
Metadata.summary: Arne, Calle, and Gunnar are friends, probably in their twenties. One telephones the others, and they decide to visit a nightclub. They hope to meet women and have sex. After they arrive at the club, each man meets with a certain degree of success or failure. Calle particularly is frustrated, for no woman agrees to dance with him. Meanwhile, Arne and Gunnar are busily conversing with women. Eventually the friends all leave with lady friends in tow, and spend the night in various apartments. In the morning, the couples depart differently. One couple has bonded amicably, another tenuously, and the third not at all. The next day, the men reconnect, and decide to try their luck again.  Written by veloc

Part.file: /mnt/nas/video/Movies/mommy/ADULTS ONLY/Shall We Go To My Or Your Place Or Each Go Home Alone [1973].mp4

Metadata.title: The Shawshank Redemption
Metadata.summary: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
Metadata.tagline: Fear can hold you prisoner. Hope can set you free.

Metadata.title: Sisters
Metadata.summary: Two sisters decide to throw one last house party before their parents sell their family home.
Metadata.tagline: Big sisters don't always know best.

Metadata.title: The Sixth Sense
Metadata.summary: A boy who communicates with spirits that don't know they're dead seeks the help of a disheartened child psychologist.
Metadata.tagline: Not every gift is a blessing.

Metadata.title: Skyfall
Metadata.summary: Bond's loyalty to M is tested when her past comes back to haunt her. Whilst MI6 comes under attack, 007 must track down and destroy the threat, no matter how personal the cost.
Metadata.tagline: Think on your sins.

Metadata.title: Slacker
Metadata.summary: A day in the life of Austin, Texas as the camera roams from place to place and provides a brief look at the overeducated, the social misfits, the outcasts and the oddballs.

Metadata.title: Snatch
Metadata.summary: Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers, and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.
Metadata.tagline: Stealin' Stones and Breakin' Bones.

Metadata.title: Son of Saul
Metadata.summary: In the horror of 1944 Auschwitz, a prisoner forced to burn the corpses of his own people finds moral survival upon trying to salvage from the flames the body of a boy he takes for his son.

Metadata.title: Sophie's Choice
Metadata.summary: After spending time with his new neighbors, an aspiring writer realizes they are harboring deep secrets that will forever change him.

Metadata.title: Spy Game
Metadata.summary: Retiring CIA agent Nathan Muir recalls his training of Tom Bishop while working against agency politics to free him from his Chinese captors.
Metadata.tagline: It's not how you play the game. It's how the game plays you.

Metadata.title: Stalingrad
Metadata.summary: The story follows a group of German soldiers, from their Italian R in the summer of 1942 to the frozen steppes of Soviet Russia and ending with the battle for Stalingrad.

Metadata.title: A Star Is Born
Metadata.summary: A musician helps a young singer find fame, even as age and alcoholism send his own career into a downward spiral.

Metadata.title: State and Main
Metadata.summary: A movie crew invades a small town whose residents are all too ready to give up their values for showbiz glitz.
Metadata.tagline: Big movie. Small town. Huge trouble.

Metadata.title: Suicide Kings
Metadata.summary: A group of youngsters kidnap a respected Mafia figure.

Metadata.title: The Sweet Hereafter
Metadata.summary: A bus crash in a small town brings a lawyer to the town to defend the families, but he discovers that everything is not what it seems.
Metadata.tagline: There is no such thing as the simple truth.

Metadata.title: Tae Guk Gi: The Brotherhood of War
Metadata.summary: A drama about the fate of brothers forced to fight in the Korean War.

Part.file: /mnt/nas/video/Movies/mommy/ADULTS ONLY/Tae Guk Gi - The Brotherhood of War [2004].mp4

Metadata.title: Three Billboards Outside Ebbing, Missouri
Metadata.summary: A mother personally challenges the local authorities to solve her daughter's murder when they fail to catch the culprit.

Metadata.title: Three Kingdoms: Resurrection of the Dragon
Three Kings
Metadata.summary: In the aftermath of the Persian Gulf War, four soldiers set out to steal gold that was stolen from Kuwait, but they discover people who desperately need their help.
Metadata.tagline: It's good to be King.

Metadata.title: A Time to Kill
Metadata.summary: In Canton, Mississippi, a fearless young lawyer and his assistant defend a black man accused of murdering two white men who raped his 10-year-old daughter, inciting a revolt by local racist groups.
Metadata.tagline: Experience a time you'll never forget.

Metadata.title: Tokyo Drifter
Metadata.summary: Tokyo Drifter acts as an ode to Tokyo, with a very simple premise: a musician (Kenta Maeno) wanders around various darkened areas of the city on a rainy night in May with his guitar, singing songs about life, love, and Tokyo itself. Matsue and Maeno together take the city in all its gritty glory and attempt to shine a light on the darkness.

Metadata.title: Tombstone
Metadata.summary: A successful lawman's plans to retire anonymously in Tombstone, Arizona, are disrupted by the kind of outlaws he was famous for eliminating.
Metadata.tagline: Justice is coming.

Metadata.title: Traffic
Metadata.summary: A conservative judge is appointed by the President to spearhead America's escalating war against drugs, only to discover that his teenage daughter is a crack addict. Two DEA agents protect an informant. A jailed drug baron's wife attempts to carry on the family business.
Metadata.tagline: No one gets away clean

Metadata.title: Turn the River
Metadata.summary: A pool shark takes the ultimate gamble when she kidnaps her own son and flees her ex-husband.

Metadata.title: Two Hands
Metadata.summary: A 19 year old finds himself in debt to a local gangster when some gang loot disappears and sets him on the run from thugs. Meanwhile two street kids start a shopping spree when they find the missing money.
Metadata.tagline: It was only one mistake, but it was a big one.

Metadata.title: Unforgiven
Metadata.summary: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner and a young man.
Metadata.tagline: Some legends will never be forgotten. Some wrongs can never be forgiven.

Metadata.title: Unforgiven
Metadata.summary: Set in Hokkaido, Japan in the 1880's. Jubei Kamata (Ken Watanabe), who is on the side of the Edo shogunate government, kills many people. His name is infamous in Kyoto. When the battle at Goryoukaku is about to be finished, Jubei disappears. 10 years later, Jubei lives with his kid in relative peace. He is barely able to make a living. Protecting his dead wife's grave, Jubei has decided to never pick up a sword again, but due to poverty he has no choice but to pick the sword again. Jubei becomes a bounty hunter.

Metadata.title: The Usual Suspects
Metadata.summary: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat, which began when five criminals met at a seemingly random police lineup.
Metadata.tagline: Five Criminals. One Line Up. No Coincidence.

Metadata.title: Wag the Dog
Metadata.summary: Shortly before an election, a spin-doctor and a Hollywood producer join efforts to fabricate a war in order to cover up a presidential sex scandal.
Metadata.tagline: A comedy about truth, justice and other special effects.

Metadata.title: Waking the Dead
Metadata.summary: A congressional candidate questions his sanity after seeing the love of his life, presumed dead, suddenly emerge.
Metadata.tagline: Sometimes love has a life of it's own.

Metadata.title: War
Metadata.summary: During the bloody war in Chechnya, a British couple and two Russian soldiers are taken hostage by Chechen rebels. Two of the hostages are then released to bring the money for the British woman who is forced to wait for the ransom.
Metadata.tagline: This is no

Metadata.title: We Were Soldiers
Metadata.summary: The story of the first major battle of the American phase of the Vietnam War and the soldiers on both sides that fought it, while their wives wait nervously and anxiously at home for the good news or the bad news.
Metadata.tagline: 400 U.S paratroopers. 4000 Vietnamese soldiers. 12 000 miles away from home. 1 man led them into battle.

Metadata.title: When Harry Met Sally...
Metadata.summary: Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship.
Metadata.tagline: Can two friends sleep together and still love each other in the morning?

Metadata.title: Where Eagles Dare
Metadata.summary: Oscar-winners Clint Eastwood ("Million Dollar Baby," "Mystic River") and Richard Burton ("The Spy Who Came in from the Cold," "Who's Afraid of Virginia Woolf?") lead a small group of Allied paratroopers deep into enemy territory to rescue an American gene
Metadata.tagline: One Weekend Major Smith, Lieutenant Schaffer, And A Beautiful Blonde Named Mary Decided To Win World War II

Metadata.title: Who's That Knocking at My Door
Metadata.summary: A young man struggles with the fact that his girlfriend was once raped.

Metadata.title: Widows
Metadata.summary: From acclaimed director Steve McQueen (12 Years a Slave) and co-writer Gillian Flynn (Gone Girl)
Metadata.tagline: Left with nothing. Capable of anything.

Metadata.title: The Wife
Metadata.summary: A wife questions her life choices as she travels to Stockholm with her husband, where he is slated to receive the Nobel Prize for Literature.
Metadata.tagline: Secrets lie between the lines

Metadata.title: Winter Light
Metadata.summary: A small town priest struggles with his faith.
Metadata.tagline: I assure you it is a beautiful movie!

Metadata.title: The Winter War
Metadata.summary: Russia attacked Finland in late November 1939. This film tells the story of a Finnish platoon of reservists from the municipality of Kauhava in the province of Pohjanmaa/Ostrobothnia who leave their homes and go to war. The film focuses on the farmer brothers Martti and Paavo Hakala.
Metadata.tagline: They held back the Russian Juggernaut in a frozen Hell!

Metadata.title: Wonder Boys
Metadata.summary: An English Professor tries to deal with his wife leaving him, the arrival of his editor who has been waiting for his book for seven years, and the various problems that his friends and associates involve him in.
Metadata.tagline: Undependable. Unpredictable. Unforgettable.

Metadata.title: The Yards
Metadata.summary: In the rail yards of Queens, contractors repair and rebuild the city's subway cars. These contracts are lucrative, so graft and corruption are rife. When Leo Handler gets out of prison, he finds his aunt married to Frank Olchin, one of the big contractors; he's battling with a minority-owned firm for contracts.
Metadata.tagline: He's the target of the most merciless family in New York. His own.

Metadata.title: Герой нашего времени
Metadata.summary: In an adaptation of Mikhail Lermontov's classic 19th century Russian novel "A Hero of Our Time", soldier Pechorin battles with love and fate in the Caucasus.
